argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplgrp.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer R ) = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> I e. V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> R e. CRing ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_psrcrng | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( I mPwSer R ) e. CRing ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` P ) = ( Base ` P ) |
| 7 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 9 | 2, 1, 6, 3, 8 | #P_mplsubrg | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( Base ` P ) e. ( SubRing ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 6 | #P_mplval2 | |- P = ( ( I mPwSer R ) |`s ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_subrgcrng | |- ( ( ( I mPwSer R ) e. CRing /\ ( Base ` P ) e. ( SubRing ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) -> P e. CRing ) |
| 12 | 5, 9, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> P e. CRing ) |
